abstract: North Korea's claim that it has constructed nuclear weapons small enough to be carried by missiles is questioned by American and South Korean officials; some analysts say missile test photos released by North Korea to substantiate announcement may have been altered.
lead_paragraph: Pyongyang said it already has nuclear weapons compact enough to be carried by missiles, but an American commander cast doubt on the North’s other recent claims.

headline.main: North Korea Claims It Has Built Small Nuclear Warheads
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; North Korea: Missile Test Is Questioned

snippet: Pyongyang said it already has nuclear weapons compact enough to be carried by missiles, but an American commander cast doubt on the North’s other recent claims.
